text: The Russia women's national under-18 and under-19 is a national basketball team of Russia and is administered by the Russian Basketball Federation.Profile - Russia, FIBA.com, Retrieved 26 Dec 2016. It represents Russia in international under-19 and under-18 (under age 19 and under age 18) women's basketball competitions. ==History== ===FIBA Under-19 World Championship=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year !width="50"| !! width=25| !! width=25| !! width=25| |-bgcolor=silver | 1993||||7||5||2 |- | 1997||5th||7||6||1 |-bgcolor=silver | 2001||||7||5||2 |- | 2005||4th||7||4||3 |- | 2007||colspan=4|not participated |- | 2009||6th||9||5||4 |- | 2011||8th||9||3||6 |- | 2013||9th||8||4||4 |-bgcolor=silver |style="border: 3px solid red"| 2015||||7||6||1 |-bgcolor=gold | 2017||||7||7||0 |- | 2019||colspan=4|not participated |- | 2021||colspan=4|Qualified |- | 2023||colspan=4|TBD |- |Total||1 title||68||45||23 |} ===FIBA Europe Under-18 Championship=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year !width="50"| !! width=25| !! width=25| !! width=25| |- bgcolor=#9acdff | 1994||4th||7||4||3 |-bgcolor=gold | 1996||||7||6||1 |-bgcolor=#cc9966 | 1998||||8||5||3 |-bgcolor=gold | 2000||||8||8||0 |-bgcolor=gold | 2002||||8||8||0 |-bgcolor=gold | 2004||||8||7||1 |- | 2005||5th||8||5||3 |- | 2006||11th||8||5||3 |-bgcolor=#cc9966 | 2007||||8||5||3 |-bgcolor=silver | 2008||||8||6||2 |- | 2009||9th||8||3||5 |- | 2010||5th||9||6||3 |- | 2011||13th||9||5||4 |-bgcolor=silver | 2012||||9||6||3 |- | 2013||5th||9||7||2 |-bgcolor=gold | 2014||||9||8||1 |-bgcolor=#cc9966 | 2015||||9||6||3 |-bgcolor=#cc9966 | 2016||||7||6||1 |- | 2017||11th||7||3||4 |- bgcolor=#9acdff | 2019||4th||7||4||3 |- |Total||5 titles|| || || |} ==See also== * Russia women's national basketball team * Russia women's national under-17 basketball team * Soviet Union women's national under-19 basketball team ==References== ==External links== *Archived records of Russia team participations u19 Category:Women's national under-19 basketball teams
